description: Proven strategies for improving website quality in each category

missingCSS.fix: Generate complete CSS file with color palette, typography, spacing system

noColorSystem.fix: Define cohesive color palette (primary, secondary, accent) based on industry

poorTypography.fix: Implement typography hierarchy with display fonts for headings, readable body fonts

inconsistentSpacing.fix: Use 8px grid system (8, 16, 24, 32, 48, 64, 96px) for consistent spacing

noImages.fix: Add custom images, illustrations, or high-quality curated visuals (not stock photos)

improvementSteps: Ensure CSS file exists and is complete
Define color palette from style system

duplicateContent.fix: Generate unique content for each section based on section type

genericFiller.fix: Replace generic phrases with specific, industry-relevant content

noLocationSpecific.fix: Add location-specific content (city, region) where relevant

noServiceDetails.fix: Describe services in detail with specific use cases, not generic terms

missingValueProps.fix: Add clear, differentiated value propositions (not 'we are the best')

improvementSteps: Ensure each section has unique content

singleCTA.fix: Add multiple CTAs throughout the page (hero, sections, footer)

noContactInfo.fix: Add contact information (phone, email, address, form)

noTestimonials.fix: Add testimonials, case studies, or client logos for social proof

noTrustSignals.fix: Add trust signals (certifications, memberships, years in business)

weakCTAs.fix: Use action-oriented CTAs ('Book Consultation' not 'Learn More')

noMetaDescription.fix: Add compelling meta description (150-165 chars) with CTA

brokenTitle.fix: Fix page title (50-60 chars, includes location/service, proper grammar)

poorHeadingHierarchy.fix: Ensure proper H1 → H2 → H3 hierarchy, one H1 per page

noSchemaMarkup.fix: Add schema markup (Organization, LocalBusiness, Service, FAQPage)

noLocationKeywords.fix: Include location keywords in H1 and throughout content

noAltText.fix: Add descriptive alt text to all images

improvementSteps: Fix page title (proper length, includes keywords)

brokenNavigation.fix: Fix navigation links to match actual sections

noUserJourney.fix: Design clear user journeys for different audience types

poorMobileExperience.fix: Ensure responsive design works on mobile (test at 390px, 768px)

confusingStructure.fix: Organize sections logically (hero → services → testimonials → contact)

genericTemplate.fix: Create unique visual identity with custom design elements

noBrandIdentity.fix: Develop cohesive brand identity (colors, typography, spacing)

noCustomImages.fix: Use custom illustrations or photography, not stock photos

noDifferentiation.fix: Add unique design elements that differentiate from competitors

improvementWorkflow.step1: Identify all issues with severity >= high
improvementWorkflow.step2: Fix critical issues first (CSS, duplicate content, broken navigation)
improvementWorkflow.step3: Fix high-priority issues (content quality, conversion, SEO)
improvementWorkflow.step5: Fix remaining issues if score < target
improvementWorkflow.step6: Repeat until target met or max iterations reached
